channel.title: text on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in text on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-05-19
item.description: Google’s Project Starline is a ‘magic window’ for 3D telepresence (1 minute read) Google’s Project Starline uses a combination of specialized hardware and computer vision technology to create life-sized 3D images of people.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-03-15
item.description: Facebook details AI that can understand videos (6 minute read) Learning from Videos is a project from Facebook that uses AI to automatically learn audio, textual, and visual representations from videos.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-01-21
item.description: Amazon offers to help U.S. with vaccine in letter to President Biden (1 minute read) Amazon has offered to help with the US efforts involving the COVID-19 vaccine in a letter addressed to President Joe Biden.
